resources.string: Pickup boys will arrive at your home
We collect scrap from wide list of items like Newspaper, Iron, Electronic machine, Beer Bottle etc. We do not pick up cloth, wood and glass.
Choose a date when you want our executives to come for scrap pickup. You can book a request for the next day. \nOur pickup time will be betweer 10 am to 6 pm.
On the scheduled day, Our pickup executives will call you 1 hour before coming.\n\nThey will bring an electronic machine to weigh each scrap item separately.
You will get a bill on your mobile and the amount will be transferred to your bank account immediately. \n\nThe rates are non-negotiable, please check the rates before booking a pickup request.

Addscart is a doorstep service intends to help out people to sell their household scrap like Newspaper, iron, plastic books, copies, metal etc. and get paid for it. It is intended to recycle, reuse, reduce up-cycle and resell the scrap. It is a platform for the residents to participate in responsible waste management and is best in class technology, logistics to process the scrap.
